Purpura ('''[[Purpura/ecchymosis/hematoma SD-089|purpura/ecchymosis/hematoma]]''')

* red or purplish skin lesions
* separated by an interval of healthy skin
* do not disappear with vitro-pressure
* associated with extravasation of blood into the dermis
* variable in appearance: punctiform, "pinhead" (petechial purpura), in the form of linear streaks (vibices) or larger lesions (ecchymotic purpura).

question.title: What are the characteristic features of purpura?
question.description: Select the correct definition of purpura from the options below.

option_a.title: Red or purplish skin lesions that appear together

option_b.title: Skin lesions that disappear with gentle pressure

option_c.title: Variable appearance, including punctiform, petechial, linear streaks, or larger lesions

option_d.title: Associated with thrombocytopenia and do not disappear with pressure
